NOTE: Yes, I am back in encoding now. Encoding small anime series and movies only. 

Requests are accepted for a short time. DO NOT spam the comments with requests now.

1. DO NOT request long anime series.
2. Anime Movie requests are accepted.
3. You may request anime series which are within 26 episodes at most.
4. I will try to encode in BD 720p if possible, if not, then DVD 480p
5. I will review the requests and the final decision will of course be mine whether to do it or not.

You can just show your thanks by seeding a little bit (just 1:1 ratio). For more details and updates, like the official fb page if you want.
